comments.body: TypeScript will normalise this to `string[]`, so this is only useful for documentation. See https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/issues/12687.

I know, the intent here is to list those supported types in the source code so we could poke around without reading comments and also export the AutomatedBrowser type - because that's valid and it supports the compiler/intellisense. Aligned with that:
https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/42208#discussion_r377217978
I agree with your comment, but saying above, let me know if I should amend this, thx!

Not really, was just FYI. 
I agree that having it for documentation purposes is useful on its own :+1:
